Verses: 1 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Dhurogappechchu En Ullaththirkuth Theriyum; Avan Kangalukkumun Dheyvabayam Illai.
2 avan, Than Akkiramam Aruvaruppaanadhendru Kaanappadumalavum, Than Paarvaikketrapadi Thanakkuththaane Ichchagam Pesugiraan.
3 avan Vaayin Vaarththaigal Akkiramamum Vanjagamumulladhu; Buththiyaai Nadandhukolvadhaiyum Nanmai Seyvadhaiyum Vittuvittaan.
4 avan Than Padukkaiyinmel Akkiramaththai Yosiththu, Nalladhallaadha Vazhiyile Nilaiththu, Pollaappai Verukkaadhirukkiraan.
5 karththaave, Umadhu Kirubai Vaanangalil Vilangugiradhu; Umadhu Saththiyam Megamandalangal Bariyandham Ettugiradhu.
6 umadhu Needhi Magaththaana Parvadhangalpolavum, Umadhu Niyaayangal Magaa Aazhamaagavum Irukkiradhu; Karththaave, Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Kaappaatrugireer.
7 dhevane, Ummudaiya Kirubai Evvalavu Arumaiyaanadhu! Adhinaal Manubuththirar Umadhu Settaigalin Nizhalile Vandhadaigiraargal.
8 umadhu Aalayaththilulla Sambooranaththinaal Thirupthiyadaivaargal; Umadhu Perinba Nadhiyinaal Avargal Thaagaththaith Theerkkireer.
9 jeevaootru Ummidaththil Irukkiradhu; Ummudaiya Velichchaththile Velichcham Kaangirom.
10 ummai Arindhavargalmel Umadhu Kirubaiyaiyum, Semmaiyaana Irudhayamullavargalmel Umadhu Needhiyaiyum Paaraattiyarulum.
11 perumaikkaararin Kaal Enmelvaraamalum, Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Kai Ennaip Parakkadiyaamalum Iruppadhaaga.
